parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Turrets </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Lock the gunner position of the vehicle turret. This command must be executed where vehicle is [[local]]. This command will remove user get in action (not get out) but will also stop player getting into vehicle via script commands unlike [[lock]] command</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle '''lockTurret''' [turret path,lock] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] -  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [turret path,lock]: [[Array]] -  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> Nothing </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>vehicleName [[lockTurret]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>0,0], [[true]]];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[vehicle]] [[player]] [[lockTurret]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>0],[[true]]];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>  

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[lockedTurret]], [[lockCargo]], [[lockDriver]], [[assignedVehicleRole]], [[turretUnit]], [[moveInTurret]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part></template>
